title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 25.2 - Publication of notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 25.2 - Publication of notice

State Regulations

Each notice of the sale of bonds shall be published at
least once in the Daily Bond Buyer, 1 State Street Plaza, New York, NY 10004, except as otherwise provided in sections 25.3 and
25.4
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
25.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
